html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-02312020-04-03
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectDirection to the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Respecting the Implementation of the Canada-United States-Mexico Agreement
PrecisDIRECTION TO THE CANADIAN RADIO-TELEVISION AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION RESPECTING THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE CANADA–UNITED STATES–MEXICO AGREEMENT in order to (1) implement the Canada–United States–Mexico Agreement (CUSMA) commitments to implement paragraphs 1 and 4 of Annex 15-D of CUSMA; and (2) allow the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission (CRTC) to follow its own established rule-making process to give effect to the commitments and preserves the CRTC's independence.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0077 Publication Date: 2020-04-29
AttachmentsAttachment
